title: 10000-nichi no 7
description:
An e-book exclusive collection of the talented Sci-fi author Yamamoto Atsuji's short stories, chosen by the man himself. Some of these went on to become original works in their own right!! Includes some extremely rare masterpieces such as "Phantom Kids", which became the basis for "Elf 17", as well as "Mai Majin", which was drawn immediately after the author's debut. Included at the end is an interview with the author where he reveals the origin of the book's title as well as commentary about these stories.

Included Works:
- Magic Dancer「舞魔人」(1978)
- Phantom Kids「ファントム・キッズ」(1984, Weekly Shonen Magazine)
- The Wizard's Fortune「魔道士の遺産」(1985, Comic Reader)
- Space Patrol Hana「宇宙パトロールハーナ」(1986, Melty Lemon)
- The Doctor is an Animal「どうぶつがお医者さん」(2001, Neko Mix)
- Ecstatic Mei「エクスタティックメイ」(2007, Business Jump zoukan - BJ Soul)
- Ecstatic Mei 2「エクスタティックメイ２」
